channel.title: How this board works
channel.description:
First of all, congrats on a first edition. You guys did an excellent job. I really look forward to seeing this continue. In order to help with it, I've setup this board to hopefully simplify the discussion and channels of communication needed to assemble this thing.
Flame_, being the originator, has full moderator access over the group that can post in this board. You guys should/will have basic moderator privileges in this board (locking and sticking). Feel free to talk to flame_ who whoever else will be involved in the future management of the mopar monthly team.
If you guys don't already have a google docs setup, I would strongly recommend it. It will allow you all to work on the mopar monthly simultaneously and discuss it in real-time, along with long-term discussion and planning on this forum. It should also make transitioning over to the frontpage blog rather easy and quick.
Thanks and goodluck on future editions!

item.title: How this board works
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

Thanks Taharok! Although I think it’s only right for me to say that the first edition was entirely down to Flame_ so full congratulations to him!

(I can finally lock topics… my plan has begun evil face)

Read full topic

item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Great, thanks a lot!
